content: techniques for this problem are metaphor synthesis and transformational synthesis, respectively. Both of these techniques can be effective tools for generating new ideas and insights, and for identifying opportunities for innovation and improvement. However, they may not be as practical or feasible as hyper synthesis, and may not result in solutions that are as efficient or effective. Nonetheless, they can still be useful tools in our toolkit, and can be employed in conjunction with hyper synthesis to achieve the best possible results.
